languages.text: "Не самым обычным способом. Мои предки провинились перед вашим предком и были назначены инфернусами. Тяжелая работа, смертельные риски — одним словом, много возможностей искупить грехи. Преступники уже несколько поколений как мертвы, а мы все отбываем наказание за них. Может, однажды и рассчитаемся".

"Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed inferni as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."
languages.original_text: "Не самым обычным способом. Мои предки провинились перед вашим предком и были назначены инфернусами. Тяжелая работа, смертельные риски — одним словом, много возможностей искупить грехи. Преступники уже несколько поколений как мертвы, а мы все отбываем наказание за них. Может, однажды и рассчитаемся".

traits.locale_text: "Not in the usual way. My ancestors had wronged your ancestor and were appointed Inferna. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. The criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption some day."

"Not in the usual way. My ancestors had wronged your ancestor and were appointed Inferna. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. The criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption some day."

"Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed Inferna as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."

"Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed Inferna as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."

"Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed inferni as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."

"Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed inferni as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."

languages.text: « Pas de la manière habituelle. Mes ancêtres ont fait du tort aux vôtres, ce qui leur a valu d'être nommés Infernus. Dur labeur, risques constants... Bref, bien assez d'occasions de se repentir. Mais ces criminels ont beau être morts depuis des générations, on est toujours là, à racheter leurs fautes. J'espère qu'un jour, on trouvera la rédemption. »
languages.original_text: "Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed inferni as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."

traits.locale_text: « Pas de la manière habituelle. Mes ancêtres ont fait du tort aux vôtres, ce qui leur a valu d'être nommés Infernus. Dur labeur, risques constants... Bref, bien assez d'occasions de se repentir. Mais ces criminels ont beau être morts depuis des générations, on est toujours là, à racheter leurs fautes. J'espère qu'un jour, on trouvera la rédemption. »

languages.text: «No de la forma habitual. Mis ancestros ofendieron a los suyos y fueron nombrados infernus por ello. Trabajo duro, riesgo de muerte y un sinfín de oportunidades para enmendar la ofensa. Esos delincuentes llevan muertos generaciones, pero seguimos sirviendo su condena. A lo mejor un día podemos encontrar la redención».
languages.original_text: "Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed inferni as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."

traits.locale_text: «No de la forma habitual. Mis ancestros ofendieron a los suyos y fueron nombrados infernus por ello. Trabajo duro, riesgo de muerte y un sinfín de oportunidades para enmendar la ofensa. Esos delincuentes llevan muertos generaciones, pero seguimos sirviendo su condena. A lo mejor un día podemos encontrar la redención».

languages.text: “我们的由来可能不太寻常。我们的先祖背叛了您的先祖，作为惩罚，我们承担起了这份工作，忍受着艰苦的劳作和致命的风险，也得到了许多赎罪的机会。那些犯了罪的先人早就死光了，但我们还在为他们的罪行服刑。或许有朝一日，我们也能得到救赎吧。”
languages.original_text: "Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed inferni as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."

traits.locale_text: “我们的由来可能不太寻常。我们的先祖背叛了您的先祖，作为惩罚，我们承担起了这份工作，忍受着艰苦的劳作和致命的风险，也得到了许多赎罪的机会。那些犯了罪的先人早就死光了，但我们还在为他们的罪行服刑。或许有朝一日，我们也能得到救赎吧。”

languages.text: 「通常の方法ではありません。私の先祖たちは、あなた方に不義を働き、その結果インフェルニに任命された。過酷な労働、命がけの危険、償いの機会はいくらでもある。あいつら犯罪者たちは何世代も前に死んだが、我々はまだ彼らの刑に服しているんです。いつか贖罪の日が来るかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed inferni as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."

traits.locale_text: 「通常の方法ではありません。私の先祖たちは、あなた方に不義を働き、その結果インフェルニに任命された。過酷な労働、命がけの危険、償いの機会はいくらでもある。あいつら犯罪者たちは何世代も前に死んだが、我々はまだ彼らの刑に服しているんです。いつか贖罪の日が来るかもしれません」

languages.text: "Nicht auf die übliche Weise. Meine Ahnen haben die Euren erzürnt und wurden daher zu Inferni ernannt. Harte Arbeit, tödliche Risiken, reichlich Gelegenheit, Buße zu tun. Diese Verbrecher sind seit Generationen tot, doch wir sitzen noch immer ihre Strafe ab. Vielleicht finden wir eines Tages die Erlösung."
languages.original_text: "Not in the usual way. My ancestors wronged yours and were appointed inferni as a result. Hard labour, deadly risks, plenty of opportunities to atone. Those criminals have been dead for generations, but we are still serving their time. Maybe we will find redemption one day."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht auf die übliche Weise. Meine Ahnen haben die Euren erzürnt und wurden daher zu Inferni ernannt. Harte Arbeit, tödliche Risiken, reichlich Gelegenheit, Buße zu tun. Diese Verbreche sind seit Generationen tot, doch wir sitzen noch immer ihre Strafe ab. Vielleicht finden wir eines Tages die Erlösung."

string_traits.trait: Встраивание генокрадов и офицеров в мейнсюжет (Зауэрбэк + Инфернус)
